quote: I have no right to say or do anything that diminishes a man in his own eyes. What matters is not what I think of him but what he thinks of himself. Hurting a man in his dignity is a crime.
quote_letters: I HAVE NO RIGHT TO SAY OR DO ANYTHING THAT DIMINISHES A MAN IN HIS OWN EYES WHAT MATTERS IS NOT WHAT I THINK OF HIM BUT WHAT HE THINKS OF HIMSELF HURTING A MAN IN HIS DIGNITY IS A CRIME
